parameters.name: AliyunLang
parameters.description:
The language. Default value: zh.

Valid values:
*   en: English
*   zh: Chinese

parameters.name: BindResourceId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource bound to the environment, such as the container ID or VPC ID. For a Cloud environment, specify the region ID.

parameters.name: EnvironmentSubType
parameters.description:
The subtype of the environment. Valid values:

*   CS: Container Service for Kubernetes (ACK) or Distributed Cloud Container Platform for Kubernetes (ACK One)
*   ECS: ECS
*   Cloud: cloud service

parameters.name: EnvironmentType
parameters.description:
The type of the environment. Valid values:

*   CS: Container Service
*   ECS: Elastic Compute Service
*   Cloud: cloud service

parameters.name: FeePackage
parameters.description:
The payable resource plan.

*   If the EnvironmentType parameter is set to CS, set the value to CS_Basic or CS_Pro. Default value: CS_Basic.
*   Otherwise, leave the parameter empty.

parameters.name: GrafanaWorkspaceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Grafana workspace associated with the environment. If this parameter is left empty, the default shared Grafana workspace is used.

parameters.name: InitEnvironment
parameters.description: Specifies whether to initialize the environment.

parameters.name: ManagedType
parameters.description:
Specifies whether agents or exporters are managed. Valid values:

*   none: No. By default, no managed agents or exporters are provided for ACK clusters.
*   agent: Agents are managed. By default, managed agents are provided for ASK clusters, ACS clusters, and ACK One clusters.
*   agent-exporter: Agents and exporters are managed. By default, managed agents and exporters are provided for cloud services.

parameters.name: PrometheusInstanceId
parameters.description: The ID of the Prometheus instance. If no Prometheus instance is created, call the InitEnvironment operation.

parameters.name: ResourceGroupId
parameters.description: The ID of the resource group.

parameters.name: Tags
parameters.description: The tags of the instance. You can specify this parameter to manage tags for the instance.
